examples: One of the bricks feels slightly loose.
The top of the tap has come loose. A screw had worked loose from the door handle.

meanings.meaning: not shut in or tied up

examples: The animals had broken loose from their pens. (figurative) The organization broke loose from its sponsors. He felt he had to cut loose from his family.
I'm going to let the dogs loose.
